SignIn.title: Welcome <highlight>Back</highlight>
SignIn.subtitle: Enter your details to Sign in

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Nakiese?
WhyChooseUs.subtitle: Experience the vibrant essence of authentic African living with a platform built on trust, quality, and convenience.

features.best_price_desc: We ensure you get the most competitive rates for African stays, matching any lower price you find.
features.locations_desc: Every hotel and restaurant is personally verified to ensure it meets our 'Gateway to the Exceptional' standard.
features.secure_desc: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. Book with confidence and peace of mind.
features.support_desc: Our team is available around the clock to assist you, from check-in to check-out.

SignInBanner.description: Register yourself for a better experience and save money on your next purchase.

Testimonials.title: Loved by Travelers
Testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. See what adventurers from around the world are saying about their Nakiese experience.

review_1.name: Sarah Jenkins
review_1.text: Nakiese made our honeymoon to Zanzibar absolutely magical. The hotel recommendation was spot on, and the booking process was seamless.

review_2.name: David Okafor
review_2.text: Finally, a platform that truly understands African luxury. I booked a business dinner through their restaurant finder and it was impeccable.

review_3.name: Elena Rodriguez
review_3.text: The 24/7 support team helped me change my reservation last minute without any hassle. Highly recommended for peace of mind!

Newsletter.title: Unlock Exclusive Savings
Newsletter.desc_part2: your first booking, plus secret deals sent to your inbox.

Profile.title: Personal Details
Profile.subtitle: Update your information and manage your account details.

validation.min_age: You must be at least 16 years old

Security.title: Security Settings
Security.subtitle: Manage your password, sessions, and account security.

change_password.title: Password
change_password.desc: Change your password regularly to keep your account secure.

two_factor.title: 2FA Authentication
two_factor.desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.desc: Log out from all other devices and browsers.
sessions.confirm: Are you sure you want to log out from all devices?

delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.desc: Permanently remove your account and data.
delete_account.warning_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please check your password.
